page.name: Muslim Students Association (MSA)
page.description: The purpose of Muslim Student Association (MSA) is to provide a safe, stress-free, and fun space for Muslim students to improve and support our own community [Ummah]; we promote open dialogue regarding issues affecting the local, national, and international Islamic community. We desire to share the beauty and diversity of the global Muslim community while having a positive impact on our middle school and the larger Mason City School community.
